          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Boiling point-composition diagram hydrochloric acid solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kochende Salzsäurelösung des Punkt-Aufbau 
Diagramms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solution d'ébullition d'acide chlorhydrique de 
diagramme de point-composition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Solução ácida hydrochloric fervendo do diagrama
da ponto-composição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soluzione d'ebollizione dell'acido cloridrico 
dello schema della punto-composizione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να βράσει διάλυμα υδροχλωρικού οξέος διαγραμμάτων 
σημείο-σύνθεσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Solución ácida hidroclórica del diagrama de la
punta-composicio'n que hierve</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates how the boiling point changes as chemical composition is varied for a mixture of hydrogen chloride and water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boiling point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical composition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distillation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquid mixtures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vapour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, wie der 
Siedepunkt ändert, während chemischer Aufbau für eine Mischung der 
Wasserstoffchlorverbindung und -wassers verändert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre comment le point 
d'ébullition change pendant que la composition chimique est changée 
pour un mélange de chlorure et d'eau d'hydrogène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra como o ponto fervendo muda 
enquanto a composição química é variada para uma mistura do 
cloreto e da água de hidrogênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra come il punto di 
ebollizione cambia mentre la composizione chimica è variata per una 
miscela dell'acido cloridrico e dell'acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί πώς οι να βράσουν αλλαγές
σημείου ως χημική σύνθεση είναι ποικίλες για ένα μίγμα 
υδροχλωρίου και ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra cómo la punta que hierve 
cambia mientras que la composición química se varía para una mezcla
del cloruro y del agua de hidrógeno.</string>
          </description>
